content: **hot chocolate mug ornament** cozy up your holiday decor with this crochet pattern for a hot chocolate mug ornament this easy and festive project is perfect for adding charm to your christmas tree or gifting as a mini amigurumi plushie the crochet mug looks like it s filled with warm cocoa topped with fluffy marshmallows and finished with a pretty heart for an extra dash of love this crochet pattern is written in us terminology and english language only the pdf is 5 pages long and includes plenty of progress photos to help you along **supplies** 3mm crochet hook dk weight yarn scissors sewing needle toy stuffing **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand - stylecraft squeeze me dk a - brown b - pink c - white d - red total 29 yards **gauge** 3mm hook 2 x 2 swatch = 10 row of 10 single_crochet **finished size** height 7cm x width 6cm excluding handle **skill level** easy **abbreviations us terms ** blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet magic_ring - magic_ring popcorn - popcorn r - round / row single_crochet - single_crochet 2sc - 2 single_crochet in 1 space increase decrease - single_crochet 2 together decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch st/sts - stitch/stitches **notes** a free basic online version of this crochet pattern is available on https //hookfully com/free-crochet-hot-chocolate-mug-ornament-pattern/
